title: PlayBill2
content:
Hello!  
I tried a bunch of the suggestions and here's the next draft. Personally I like the new "S" and the "ong", but Goudy for "Enriching Life through", really bugs me. The clients typeface is Goudy Old Style, so I cannot change that one. Does anyone have any suggestions on the clumping of the title. Its just not working.  
Thanks very much,  
Kate
